definition[0]: the act of shrinking, or the amount that something shrinks
example[0]: Pollution led to a shrinkage of grasslands.
example[1]: There has been a shrinkage in wage growth, pension coverage, and health insurance coverage.
definition[1]: when goods intended for sale are damaged, stolen by employees etc
example[2]: The manager of the store is allowed only 1% shrinkage.
example[3]: Shrinkage — or theft — is a very real problem for industry.
